definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Also the phasors of generators are labeled with the corresponding standard time.
sentences.chinese: 同时这些相角信息也贴上了相应的时间标签。

sentences.english: In the grid voltage recovering period, phase angle compensation control is used.
sentences.chinese: 在电网电压恢复阶段采用相角补偿控制。

sentences.english: It has a magnitude as well as phase angle.
sentences.chinese: 感抗不但有幅值，而且有相角，它是一个复数量。

sentences.english: Phase difference between the terminal voltage of an alternator and its electromotive force.
sentences.chinese: 交流电机的端电压和其电动势之间的相角差。

sentences.english: It has a magnitude as well as phase angle. It is a complex quantity.
sentences.chinese: 感抗不但有幅值，而且有相角，它是复。

sentences.english: Gain and phase margins are two well-known measures for maintaining the robustness of the control system.
sentences.chinese: 幅值和相角裕量是表征系统稳定程度的两个重要指标。

definition: rating (for power output, flame resistance etc)
harmonic (wave with frequency an integer multiple of the fundamental)
